review: Love the box and remote!  I thought that your videos would have more of a current selection that would be free even for prime nembers. Netflix has a better free choice.
author: Mary Williams

review: Overall I like it a lot. I would like controls to have a few options.
author: patrick M. Anderson

review: This device has a confusing UI and no power switch. What's with that? It is marginally better than the lousy UI and apps with which a Samsung SmartTV ships, but this is not saying much. The games available for this device are not very good. This product leaves plenty of room for improvement, so does my rating.
author: Christine N. Bush "technical kindred"

review: Love the fire tv! All you have to do is sit back, relax and watch whatever you want! Definitely a 5 star rating!
author: pamela blodgett

review: Delighted! It's everything we expected. Having fun with it.
author: Amy Gill

review: Fabulous!  I have both the fire TV and the fire stick!  Works just like they said. :O)
author: Lala

review: I guess I just don't get it.  There isn't much to it.  I have XFinity cable...so can access pretty much what I can access through this.  I guess I thought there would be access to a great deal more and it either just isn't there or I don't see it.
author: Ken Proctor

review: Good device, easy setup, speedy performance.
author: Tony Robles

review: Product met or exceeded my expectations.
author: EV
